overview: Once a year the porn industry meets at the Hustlaball in the legendary KIT KAT Club in Berlin. There are lively orgies and fans from the audience suddenly find themselves in the middle of the juicy action on stage. Groupies are towed into the Pornstar apartment and at the VIP parties. Backstage in Berlin" documents how uninhibitedly lively the Erocreations stars go off around the Hustlaball and the Venusmesse.  Whoever sees this, just wants to be there himself and will mark October a year firmly in his planner, when the guys from EroCreations in Berlin once again really "let the pig out".
title: Backstage in Berlin
